elements.description:
### Usage
    This is a helper component to support display of button on hover effect in px-tile and avoid duplicate code
    
    <px-tile-action-buttons action-buttons="{{actionButtons}}" primary="true" overlay="false"></px-tile-action-buttons>
    
    If items <= 3 it will display the elements one after the other
    If items > 3 it will display the list of elements in a dropdown

properties.name: hoverTextColor
properties.description: Current text color of overlay to apply other elements when hovering

properties.name: overlay
properties.description: Boolean to find out if items list is in overlay

properties.name: primary
properties.description: Boolean to display primary button

properties.name: actionButtons
properties.description:
Action buttons to display below the description/copy text.
Please refer to px-dropdown (https://github.com/PredixDev/px-dropdown) for a list of supported properties

methods.name: attached
methods.description: Attach event listeners for dropdown action buttons.

methods.name: detached
methods.description: Detach event listeners for dropdown action buttons.

methods.name: _actionButtonsChanged
methods.description:
Observer when actionButtons changes.  
Sets flag _isDisplayDropdown true if actionButtons size is greater than default items size 3, false otherwise.
Sets flag _isDisplayButtons true if actionButtons size is less or equal than default items size 3, false otherwise.
If _isDisplayDropdown === true it will update px-dropdown options menu

methods.name: _setupDropdownButtons
methods.description: Sets dropdown

methods.name: _onSelected
methods.description: Callback for on-tap event for action items when the list size is 3 or less

methods.name: _itemSelected
methods.description: Callback for selected/unselected action title dropdown items when the list is greater than 3

methods.name: _handleSelection
methods.description: Fires px-title-action with selection detail. E.g. {"id": "1", "label": "Favorite", "selected": true}

methods.name: _getBtnClazz
methods.description:
Return button class type and size if any
See https://github.com/PredixDev/px-buttons-design for more details.

methods.name: _getBtnType
methods.description: Returns button type class

methods.name: _getBtnSize
methods.description: Returns button size class

methods.name: _getBtnColor
methods.description: Return style for color.  This property is part of px-button so honor if passed on.

attributes.name: hover-text-color
attributes.description: Current text color of overlay to apply other elements when hovering

attributes.name: overlay
attributes.description: Boolean to find out if items list is in overlay

attributes.name: action-buttons
attributes.description:
Action buttons to display below the description/copy text.
Please refer to px-dropdown (https://github.com/PredixDev/px-dropdown) for a list of supported properties

elements.description:
### Usage
    This is a helper component to support editable titles via an inline edit form
    
    <px-tile-edit-title-form validator="{{titleValidator}}" current-title="{{mainTitle}}" new-title="[[mainTitle]]" show-edit-form="{{_showEditForm}}"></px-tile-edit-title-form>

properties.name: validator
properties.description: Validator that's executed when the title is changed via the title form.

properties.name: currentTitle
properties.description: The mainTitle property set on the px-tile when the px-tile-edit-title-form component was revealed

properties.name: newTitle
properties.description: The current value of the px-tile edit title input field. If valid, this property is used to set the mainTitle property on save.

properties.name: showEditForm
properties.description: Property used internally for showing or hiding the edit title form

methods.name: commitEdit
methods.description: Applies the input form value to the parent px-tile's mainTitle property (reflected via the currentTitle property) and hides the edit form

methods.name: cancelEdit
methods.description: Hides the edit form without saving

methods.name: handleKeypress
methods.description:
Applies validation styles to the edit form based on the result from the validator function,
and triggers save and cancel with the Enter and Escape keys respectively.

methods.name: applyValidationStyle
methods.description: Applies validation styles to the edit form.

methods.name: getValidity
methods.description: Determines the validity of the input value. If no validator function is provided, will always report true (ie. valid)

attributes.name: validator
attributes.description: Validator that's executed when the title is changed via the title form.

attributes.name: current-title
attributes.description: The mainTitle property set on the px-tile when the px-tile-edit-title-form component was revealed

attributes.name: new-title
attributes.description: The current value of the px-tile edit title input field. If valid, this property is used to set the mainTitle property on save.

attributes.name: show-edit-form
attributes.description: Property used internally for showing or hiding the edit title form

elements.description:
Px-tile is a highly customizable component for displaying text and an image or other component. Example use cases include contact cards, work orders, inspections, media tiles, or an overview of a device. ### Note There are two `` elements in which you can add custom content - `thumbnail` and `footer`. Since these `` elements are used to display custom content, you are responsible for styling that content accordingly. Make sure the content follows Predix design guidelines. ### Usage #### Example: Thumbnail Image ```
Footer Content Here
 ``` #### Example: Displaying a Predix Chart ```
Footer Content Here
 ``` ### Action Buttons Configuration The `actionButtons` property expects a configuration object in the following format. The `items` array specifies the configuration of each button, and the `maxButtons` property determines how many buttons to display in the tile - if more buttons are defined, they will be placed into an overflow dropdown menu instead. The first button configuration with `isPrimary` set as true will be considered the main button for the tile, and will be displayed in the title/header area of the tile - all others will be placed in the bottom of the tile. ``` { "items": [ { "id": "1", "label": "Return", "size": "small" }, { "id": "2", "label": "Scrap", "size": "small" }, { "id": "3", "label": "Download", "size": "small", "type": "bare", "buttonIcon": true, "icon": "px-utl:download", "isPrimary": true } ], "maxButtons": "2" } ``` Each button definition in the `items` array can have the following properties: Object Key| Value Type | Options | Default :----|:----|:---|:--- `id` | String | | `label` | String | | `size` | String | `small, regular, large, huge, full` | regular `type` | String | `primary, secondary, call to action, tertiary, bare, bare primary` | secondary `buttonIcon` | Boolean | `true, false` | false `icon` | String | See https://www.predix-ui.com/#/elements/px-icon-set | `isPrimary` | Boolean | `true, false` | false ### Styling The following custom properties are also available for styling: Custom property | Description | Default :----------------|:-------------|:---------- `--px-tile-width` | Width of the whole tile | `20rem` `--px-tile-height` | Height of the whole tile | `20rem` `--px-tile-thumbnail-width` | Width of the thumbnail portion | `20rem` `--px-tile-thumbnail-height` | Height of the thumbnail portion | `11.66667rem` `--px-tile-thumbnail-background-color` | Background color of the thumbnail portion | `white` `--px-tile-background-color` | Background color of the tile | `lightgray` `--px-tile-about-min-height` | Height of the about bottom bar | `inherit` `--px-tile-about-padding` | Padding of the about bottom bar | `inherit` `--px-tile-about-right` | Right of the about bottom bar | `inherit` `--px-tile-about-bottom` | Bottom of the about bottom bar | `inherit` `--px-tile-text-background-color` | Background color of the the bottom bar of the tile | `lightgray` `--px-tile-title-color` | Text color for title in the bottom bar | `darkslategray` `--px-tile-subtitle-color` | Text color for subtitle in the bottom bar | `gray` `--px-tile-text-color` | Text color for the description text in the bottom bar | `darkslategray` `--px-tile-action-buttons-position` | Position of action buttons | `inherit` `--px-tile-action-buttons-right` | Right position of action buttons | `inherit` `--px-tile-action-buttons-bottom` | Bottom position of action buttons | `inherit` `--px-tile-overlay-desc-line-height` | Line Height of overlay description text | `1rem` `--px-tile-overlay-desc-font-size` | Font Size of overlay description text | `0.8rem` `--px-tile-overlay-background-color` | Background color for the overlay of a hoverable tile | `black` `--px-tile-overlay-text-color` | Text color for the overlay of a hoverable tile | `white` `--px-tile-overlay-action-buttons-position` | Position of overlay action buttons | `inherit` `--px-tile-overlay-action-buttons-bottom` | Bottom position of overlay action buttons | `inherit` `--px-tile-overlay-action-buttons-right` | Right position of overlay action buttons | `inherit` `--px-tile-overlay-width` | Width of overlay action buttons | `inherit` `--px-tile-desc-text-height` | Multi-line truncation effect for description text with the specified rem value | `2rem` `--px-tile-text-height` | Height of the about section (bottom section) | `8.333rem`

properties.name: hoverable
properties.description:
If true, hovering over the card will cause an overlay to appear
with more detailed information, including the description
and an optional slot for showing a footer at the bottom.
_Note: not recommended for mobile applications due to variation
or lack of support for hover on mobile devices._

properties.name: _hovered
properties.description: Whether the tile is currently being hovered.

properties.name: mainTitle
properties.description: Main text label for the tile.

properties.name: subtitle
properties.description: Subtitle text for the tile.

properties.name: description
properties.description:
Description information to be displayed underneath tile and subtitle.
Default : Only the first ~3 lines of text will be displayed, after which it will be truncated.
You can customize by adjusting the `--px-tile-desc-text-height` CSS variable. (e.g. 1 line = 1 rem,
to set to 5 lines truncated, set `--px-tile-desc-text-height: 5rem`).

properties.name: overlayDescription
properties.description:
Description information to be displayed in the overlay of a hoverable card.
It has more space to display text content and can be adjusted along with
total height of the tile.

properties.name: actionButtons
properties.description:
Configuration object for the action buttons displayed in the tile.
The primary button is displayed in the header/title area of the tile
whereas the rest are displayed at the bottom of the tile.
The `px-tile-action-tapped` event is fired when any of the action buttons is tapped.

properties.name: titleEditable
properties.description:
Controls whether the title can be edited via an inline form.
Also enables behaviour where the title form will be shown if the title property is blank.

properties.name: titleValidator
dropHandler
properties.description: Custom function that's invoked when the drop event is fired

properties.name: _showEditForm
properties.description: Property used internally for showing or hiding the edit title form

properties.name: _selected
properties.description: Property used internally for determining the selected state on the px-tile

methods.name: _hover
methods.description: Method used internally for flipping the hovered status of a tile.

methods.name: _handleDrag
methods.description: Method used internally for setting the selected state based on the input event

methods.name: _handleDrop
methods.description:
Handles the drop event, and prevents other drag events from blocking the drop event.
The drop event will be passed to the px-tile's drop-handler function if available.

methods.name: _selectedChanged
methods.description: Sets or removes the selected class from the px-tile container based on the selected state

methods.name: _hoverableChanged
methods.description: On change callback to remove overlay

methods.name: attached
methods.description: Attach event listeners for hoverable tiles.

methods.name: detached
methods.description: Detach event listeners for hoverable tiles.

methods.name: _getClass
methods.description: Returns class to control overlay for hoverable tiles.

methods.name: _actionButtonsChanged
methods.description: On change callback for actionButtons to set _hasActionButtons and _hasPrimaryBtn flag

methods.name: _onDataChanged
methods.description: On change callback for either property to set _hasTitleActionBtn, _hasTitleSubtitleActionBtn, and _hasData flags

methods.name: _titleEditableChanged
methods.description: Observer for title-editable property, controls whether the title form will appear when _showEditForm property is true and/or when mainTitle property is blank

methods.name: _titleValidatorChanged
methods.description: Observer for title-validator property changes.

methods.name: _dropHandlerChanged
methods.description: Observer for drop-handler property changes.

attributes.name: hoverable
attributes.description:
If true, hovering over the card will cause an overlay to appear
with more detailed information, including the description
and an optional slot for showing a footer at the bottom.
_Note: not recommended for mobile applications due to variation
or lack of support for hover on mobile devices._

attributes.name: main-title
attributes.description: Main text label for the tile.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description:
Description information to be displayed underneath tile and subtitle.
Default : Only the first ~3 lines of text will be displayed, after which it will be truncated.
You can customize by adjusting the `--px-tile-desc-text-height` CSS variable. (e.g. 1 line = 1 rem,
to set to 5 lines truncated, set `--px-tile-desc-text-height: 5rem`).

attributes.description:
Description information to be displayed in the overlay of a hoverable card.
It has more space to display text content and can be adjusted along with
total height of the tile.

attributes.name: action-buttons
attributes.description:
Configuration object for the action buttons displayed in the tile.
The primary button is displayed in the header/title area of the tile
whereas the rest are displayed at the bottom of the tile.
The `px-tile-action-tapped` event is fired when any of the action buttons is tapped.

attributes.name: title-editable
attributes.description:
Controls whether the title can be edited via an inline form.
Also enables behaviour where the title form will be shown if the title property is blank.

attributes.name: title-validator
drop-handler
attributes.description: Custom function that's invoked when the drop event is fired

events.name: px-tile-action-tapped
